<!-- Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the report please:

1. Title the issue "Installation issue: <name-of-the-package>".
2. Provide the information required below.

We encourage you to try, as much as possible, to reduce your problem to the minimal example that still reproduces the issue. That would help us a lot in fixing it quickly and effectively! -->

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack spec -I petsc@3.7.7
Input spec
--------------------------------
 -   petsc@3.7.7

Concretized
--------------------------------
==> Error: An unsatisfiable version constraint has been detected for spec:

    python@2.7.18%gcc@10.2.0+bz2+ctypes+dbm~debug+libxml2+lzma~nis~optimizations+pic+pyexpat+pythoncmd+readline+shared+sqlite3+ssl~tix~tkinter~ucs4+uuid+zlib arch=cray-rhel7-zen2
        ^bzip2@1.0.8%gcc@10.2.0+shared arch=cray-rhel7-zen2
            ^diffutils@3.3%gcc@10.2.0 arch=cray-rhel7-zen2
        ^expat@2.2.10%gcc@10.2.0+libbsd arch=cray-rhel7-zen2
            ^libbsd@0.10.0%gcc@10.2.0 arch=cray-rhel7-zen2
        ^gdbm@1.18.1%gcc@10.2.0 arch=cray-rhel7-zen2
            ^readline@8.0%gcc@10.2.0 arch=cray-rhel7-zen2
                ^ncurses@6.2%gcc@10.2.0~symlinks+termlib arch=cray-rhel7-zen2
                    ^pkg-config@0.27.1%gcc@10.2.0+internal_glib arch=cray-rhel7-zen2
        ^gettext@0.21%gcc@10.2.0+bzip2+curses+git~libunistring+libxml2+tar+xz arch=cray-rhel7-zen2
            ^libiconv@1.16%gcc@10.2.0 arch=cray-rhel7-zen2
            ^libxml2@2.9.10%gcc@10.2.0~python arch=cray-rhel7-zen2
                ^xz@5.2.2%gcc@10.2.0~pic arch=cray-rhel7-zen2
                ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@10.2.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=cray-rhel7-zen2
            ^tar@1.26%gcc@10.2.0 arch=cray-rhel7-zen2
        ^libffi@3.3%gcc@10.2.0 arch=cray-rhel7-zen2
        ^libuuid@1.0.3%gcc@10.2.0 arch=cray-rhel7-zen2
        ^openssl@1.0.2k-fips%gcc@10.2.0+systemcerts arch=cray-rhel7-zen2
        ^sqlite@3.33.0%gcc@10.2.0+column_metadata+fts~functions~rtree arch=cray-rhel7-zen2


while trying to concretize the partial spec:

    py-setuptools@50.3.2%gcc@10.2.0 arch=cray-rhel7-zen2


py-setuptools requires python version 3.5:, but spec asked for 2.7.18
```

### Information on your system

[kaig@ln-0001 spack]$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.1
* **Python:** 2.7.5
* **Platform:** cray-rhel7-zen2

You probably want to disregard the fact that it says "cray". It is a Cray, but one with a rather broken software stack, which doesn't get used in my spack config.

@balay  @barrysmith  @jedbrown

I'm pretty sure that the problem isn't really petsc related, other than that petsc wants python2, and <something> wants an incompatible py-setuptools.

I do have a custom `.spack/packages.yaml`, but I also don't believe it's related (there's nothing python-related in there.

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [ ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue:  petsc@3.7.7
